extendedInfo.description: Border War Line Of Control is the modern day rendition of an arcade classic. Protect your borders with a new age weapon, a super cannon. The enemy has decided to destroy this tank and invade your borders. Use the tank and shoot down invading Parasoldiers, Air Raiders, Plasma Bombers and Plasma bombs. The game ends if 4 parasoldiers land on either side of the cannon or if the cannon is bombed by the bombers.Get ready to protect your borders with a new age weapon, the super tank!This Game is not for Android Tablet.Instructions:Use arrow keys or 4 and 6 - Move Barrel Left and Right respectivelyOk or 5 - Fire CannonGame Features:1. A classic arcade game with a refreshing new look2. Interesting and varied enemies3. Easy to use controlsCopyright:TM & (c) Jump Games.All Rights Reserved Border War Line Of Control

reviews.title: Don\'t Download
reviews.comment: One of the Shittiest Games I have ever seen on Play Store. Not really worth a Download. The One Star because I can\'t really submit a Review without a Star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea ...
reviews.comment: Poorly executed in every way. Needs better graphics,  better turret control, longer distance for enemy drop, etc.....
reviews.author: A Google User
